channel.title: Need help to get my server online
channel.description: [size=12pt]Hey, ok guys first i wanna say if your veiwing thanks for considering to help me. Okay , now about my problem i have already pf correctly on my firewall and my routers. when i do pfchecker everything is good it pings my router finds my port and ip. I also created a no-ip and have dL DUC and have it running. I have put my ip into my source and my no-ip into my client. I can connect and log on perfectly with those settings. But when ever i try to add my server to moparscape they say my server's offline. So just wanted to see if im doing it right and entered my real ip into moparscape to create my server and it went through said it was online and everything. but i never let it register because it had my real ip. I want to use no-ip but seems like whatever i try the no-ip wont work when i go to moparscape... and ideas? :confused:[/size]

item.title: Need help to get my server online
item.dc:creator: @estrider666 estrider666
item.description:
@estrider666 wrote:

yeah but that’s the thing ive had no-ip for a while now and its set to my ip but wont work im so lost now and my server is so good and ready but im stuck on this last step…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to get my server online

item.title: Need help to get my server online
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Sometimes No-IP can take 5-10 minutes to establish an actual connection to the computer.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to get my server online

item.title: Need help to get my server online
item.dc:creator: @estrider666 estrider666
item.description:
@estrider666 wrote:

I did okay this is whats happening i go into register server and fill out every and putting myserver.no-ip.org into the ip part, and no matter what i do it say my server is offline even tho i know it is. so then i try it by putting in my real ip just to try and it works so i know my servers online but when ever i use the no-ip it says im offline… seems like theres trouble with the no-ip connecting with my ip… idk

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

estrider666:

ok, well thanks for trying…

The page after you submit the data for the server. You know. The IP, the port, name, and such
Read all the text on it

item.title: Need help to get my server online
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

estrider666:

what do you mean like am i supposed to sign up with my real ip first?

No.
When you sign up there is a screen that tells you to log into the server with X-Username and X-Password.

Read full topic

Okay , now about my problem i have already pf correctly on my firewall and my routers. when i do pfchecker everything is good it pings my router finds my port and ip. I also created a no-ip and have dL DUC and have it running. I have put my ip into my source and my no-ip into my client. I can connect and log on perfectly with those settings.
